testcase.name: Verify that the elements of LoginPage are visible
Verify successful login with valid credentials (TC-344)
Verify user should be able to see all the activities on the My activity - Version1
Verify appropriate points should be added according to the contribution- Version1
Verify that the user can able to see the time the activity was done on all Activity. - Version1
Verify that the user can able to scroll down and see all the activities. - Version1
Verify user should see Add a contribution button when no contribution has been added by the user - Version1
